author: Staff Reporter
text:
Eight students of a city college were arrested by K.K. Nagar police on charges of damaging the windshield of a Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTC) bus last week. The students — James (20), Sandeep Raj (21), Saravanan (20), Praveen (20), Vasanth (19), Gunasekaran (20) and Kandan (22) and another student, a minor, got into a fight with the driver of the MTC bus on route no. 25 G while they were returning home after class at their college on Poonamallee High Road, police said. They then indulged in violence, damaging the windshield of the bus. The students were arrested on Sunday, the police added.

Student ends life

G. Keerthana (17), a Class XII student, reportedly committed suicide at her home in West Mambalam on Sunday, after performing poorly in one of her examinations, Mambalam police said. Besides the State helpline 104, suicide prevention helpline Sneha can be reached at 24640050/60.
title: 8 students held for damaging MTC bus
